captain.name: RA Jadeja
captain.reason: Consistent performer with both bat and ball, crucial for the allrounder heavy strategy.

fantasy_team.name: RD Gaikwad
fantasy_team.reason: Consistent run-scorer with a good average (39.56) and has played significant matches (23) showing consistency. Batting friendly pitch will favor.

fantasy_team.name: S Dube
fantasy_team.reason: Allrounder with decent batting average (31.23) and capable of picking up wickets. A batting friendly pitch helps scoring runs.

fantasy_team.name: MS Dhoni
fantasy_team.reason: Experienced wicketkeeper-batsman with a good average (37.6) and a proven match-winner. Wankhede favors experienced players.

fantasy_team.name: DP Conway
fantasy_team.reason: High average (38.05) in 50 matches which will be useful for scoring runs on a batting friendly pitch.

fantasy_team.name: RA Jadeja
fantasy_team.reason: Valuable all-rounder with both batting and bowling contributions. Good economy and bowling strike rate in multiple matches.

fantasy_team.name: Mustafizur Rahman
fantasy_team.reason: Experienced bowler with high wicket-taking ability. Economy and bowling strike rate is decent.

fantasy_team.name: SN Thakur
fantasy_team.reason: Bowlwer with wickets and average Economy, and bowling strike rate. Can get wickets given bowling allrounder.

fantasy_team.name: R Shepherd
fantasy_team.reason: Bowling Allrounder, has wickets with average Economy and bowling strike rate. Also helps with strike rate given bowling allrounder.

fantasy_team.name: D Madushanka
fantasy_team.reason: Bowler with wickets, and average Economy and bowling strike rate.

fantasy_team.name: JJ Bumrah
fantasy_team.reason: Key bowler for MI, known for his consistent performance and economy.

fantasy_team.name: Ishan Kishan
fantasy_team.reason: Aggressive wicketkeeper-batsman capable of providing a quick start. Batting friendly pitch and good strike rate is ideal.

vice_captain.name: RD Gaikwad
vice_captain.reason: High average and is a consistent run-scorer in matches, ideal for batting friendly pitch.
